'''Flambard Took''' was a [[Hobbits|Hobbit]] of [[the Shire]].

==History==
Flambard was the son of [[Isembard Took]], one of [[Gerontius Took|the Old Took]]'s younger sons. He had one son, [[Adelard Took|Adelard]].<ref>{{App|Took}}</ref>

==Etymology==
Like many other members of the [[Took Family|Took]] clan, Flambard's name has military connections: a flambard (''flam'' "flame" + ''bard'' "battle-axe") is a large sword with a waved or flame-shaped blade.<ref>{{HM|IE}}, "Giving of Names"</ref>
